name: Orbit Media Studios
tagline: Award winning web design and development company.
description:
Orbit is made up of passionate and experienced people focused on one goal: building websites for our clients’ clients. Since 2001, Orbit has worked on thousands of web design projects in virtually every industry.
We pride ourselves on our collaborative nature, solid processes and exceptional service. We've built our reputation for succeeding on challenging projects. Our strong process keeps our team focused and the clients involved. We love the work we do, the clients we work with and the amazing people we work alongside.
